data.name: GetTableFields
data.value:
use [{0}] SELECT DISTINCT '{0}' as [Catalog], a1.TABLE_SCHEMA as [Schema], a1.TABLE_NAME as [TableName], a1.NewType as TypeName, a1.COLUMN_NAME as PropertyName, a1.IsPrimaryKey, CASE WHEN a1.IsPrimaryKey = 1 THEN COLUMNPROPERTY(object_id(a1.TABLE_SCHEMA + '.' + a1.TABLE_NAME), a1.COLUMN_NAME, 'IsIdentity') ELSE 0 END as IsIdentitySeed, a1.ORDINAL_POSITION FROM ( /*using top because i'm putting an order by ordinal_position on it. putting a top on it is the only way for a subquery to be ordered*/ SELECT TOP 100 PERCENT
c.COLUMN_NAME, c.TABLE_NAME, c.TABLE_SCHEMA, c.DATA_TYPE, c.IS_NULLABLE, c.ORDINAL_POSITION, CASE WHEN pk.COLUMN_NAME IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as IsPrimaryKey, CASE WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'varchar' THEN 'System.String' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'nvarchar' THEN 'System.String' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'datetime' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.DateTime' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'datetime' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.DateTime]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'datetime2' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.DateTime' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'datetime2' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.DateTime]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'int' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Int32]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'int' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Int32' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'smallint' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Int16' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'smallint' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Int16]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'decimal' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Decimal' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'decimal' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Decimal]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'numeric' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Decimal' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'numeric' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Decimal]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'real' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Decimal' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'real' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Decimal]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'float' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Double' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'float' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Double]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'money' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Decimal' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'money' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Decimal]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'bigint' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Int64' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'bigint' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Int64]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'tinyint' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Byte' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'tinyint' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Byte]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'char' THEN 'System.String' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'timestamp' THEN 'System.Byte[]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'varbinary' THEN 'System.Byte[]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'bit' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Boolean' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'bit' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Boolean]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'xml' THEN 'System.String' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'image' THEN 'System.Byte[]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'uniqueidentifier' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'NO' THEN 'System.Guid' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'uniqueidentifier' AND IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' THEN 'System.Nullable`1[System.Guid]' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'text' THEN 'System.String' WHEN DATA_TYPE = 'byte[]' THEN 'System.Byte[]' END AS NewType FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.COLUMNS c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ku.TABLE_CATALOG,ku.TABLE_SCHEMA,ku.TABLE_NAME,ku.COLUMN_NAME FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLE_CONSTRAINTS AS tc INNER JOIN INFORMATION_SCHEMA.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE AS ku ON tc.CONSTRAINT_TYPE = 'PRIMARY KEY' AND tc.CONSTRAINT_NAME = ku.CONSTRAINT_NAME ) pk ON c.TABLE_CATALOG = pk.TABLE_CATALOG AND c.TABLE_SCHEMA = pk.TABLE_SCHEMA AND c.TABLE_NAME = pk.TABLE_NAME AND c.COLUMN_NAME = pk.COLUMN_NAME WHERE c.TABLE_NAME = '{1}' AND c.TABLE_SCHEMA not in ('mig','archive','hack','report','migration','test','solr') AND c.TABLE_CATALOG = '{0}' ORDER BY ORDINAL_POSITION ) AS a1 order by IsPrimaryKey desc, ORDINAL_POSITION
